seniority_level.evidence: Minimum 3 years experience required; typical mapping to mid-level role

job_family.evidence: Title is Data Engineer and responsibilities focus on ETL, reporting, and BI

sub_specialty.evidence: Experience in BI DW projects and reporting/visualization using Cognos indicates warehouse focus

leadership_expectation.evidence: No mention of people management or team lead responsibilities

primary_cloud.evidence: Nice‑to‑have list includes AWS, Google, and Azure, suggesting exposure to multiple clouds but no primary cloud is specified

secondary_clouds.evidence: All clouds are mentioned only as optional; no clear primary cloud to designate secondary ones

processing_paradigm.evidence: Focus on ETL/Data Integration tools and BI DW projects; no streaming technologies referenced

orchestrator_category.evidence: No orchestration tool (e.g., Airflow, Luigi, dbt) is referenced in the posting

storage_layer.evidence: BI DW projects imply use of a data warehouse for reporting and analytics

remote_restriction.evidence: Location specified as Pune, Maharashtra, India and work model is onsite

timezone_focus.evidence: Job is limited to India, indicating a country‑specific focus

relocation_required.evidence: Onsite requirement in Pune with no relocation language suggests candidate must already be based there

h1b_friendly.evidence: Visa sponsorship is not mentioned in the posting

opt_cpt_friendly.evidence: No reference to OPT/CPT eligibility or student visa support

citizenship_required.evidence: Only work authorization is implied; no citizenship restriction is stated

w2_vs_1099.evidence: Employment type is full_time and contract type is permanent, indicating a regular employee role

benefits_level.evidence: No benefits are listed in the extracted data

growth_path_clarity.evidence: Posting does not discuss career progression, tracks, or growth opportunities

mentorship_signals.evidence: No mentorship program or senior‑collaboration language is present

promotion_path_mentioned.evidence: No language about promotions or advancement paths appears in the posting

internal_mobility_mentioned.evidence: No mention of internal transfers or mobility opportunities

career_tracks_available.evidence: No career track options (IC, management, specialist, architect) are described

requirement_strictness.evidence: Clear must‑have skills are listed alongside a sizable nice‑to‑have list, indicating a balanced requirement set

scope_definition.evidence: Job description is focused specifically on data engineering for BI reporting and visualization

skill_inflation_detected.evidence: Required skills align with a 3‑year experience level; no unrealistic senior‑level expectations are present
